title: Minnesota Wild: The Team To Play For
description:
Linda and Emily sit down with Minnesota Wild GM Bill Guerin to talk about the success he saw during the trade deadline, especially signing Marc-Andre Fleury. Then, they're joined by none other than former right winger Ryan Callahan for our 5 Minute Major and trust us, you won't want to miss what advice he has for the captains of the league.
